Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
@gcharang you need to start like this (use
```
gdb -args ./komodod  -timestampindex=1 -reindex=1
```

Content: then, once ready, type `run` and hit enter

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: if the daemon crashes, type `backtrace` and get the output
